name: Shimano ME5 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: A dedicated trail performance cycling shoe combining excellent stiffness for pedalling with off-the-bike traction. The reinforced upper shields your toes for great protection and durability, and the slip-resistant outsole keeps your feet where you want them.Upper is synthetic leather and mesh for durable, ventilated comfort.BOA® L6 dial for quick and precise adjustments.Offset tongue and new BOA layout for increased comfort and stability.Cushioned insole for shock absorption.Shimano® Torbal torsional midsole optimizes power transfer and allows natural rider "flow" motion on descents.Shimano grippy rubber outsole maximizes durability and traction in wet conditions.
